titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: came to see me this afternoon, and finally accepted (with much expression of gratitude) my proposal for Harold. I tried my best to say just exactly the truth, & to raise no false hopes: but whether or not I succeeded who shall say?
Later Harold came, & wrote letters for me.
